findings.details: Found duplicated /about/ and /contact/ pages in about/index.html and contact/index.html alongside pages/about.html and pages/contact.html. This can cause conflicting output and SEO duplication.
Network checks are disabled in this run. External links were reviewed for structure only.
Global SEO tags and page-level description/keywords are present.
Duplicate About/Contact pages can dilute canonical indexing.
Latest posts are present with recent dates.

recommendations: Remove duplicate /about/ and /contact/ pages to prevent routing conflicts
Re-run link validation when network checks are available
